titles.title: A bill for the relief of Simeon Simeonov, Stela Simeonova, Stoyan Simeonov, and Vania Simeonova.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/9/2009--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Simeon Simeonov, Stela Simeonova, Stoyan Simeonov, and Vania Simeonova.
